briefTitle: A Non-inferiority Study Comparing Two Filgrastim Preparations in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase III, Non-inferiority Study Comparing Two Filgrastim Preparations in Preventing Chemotherapy Induced Neutropenia in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The study primary endpoint will be the rate of grade 4 neutropenia after the first cycle of chemotherapy, according to the classification Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTC-AE)
